alert.note: Alert for Lyon; Sioux (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 15 at 6:03PM CDT until September 15 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lyon County in northwestern Iowa... Northeastern Sioux County in northwestern Iowa... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 602 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alvord, or near Rock Rapids, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... George and Doon around 610 PM CDT. Hull around 615 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
